mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAZWISKO, IMIE, EMAIL, LOCKED, DATA_OD, DATA_DO, DATA_HASLA from jwt_user where username = #{login}
SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAZWISKO, IMIE, EMAIL, LOCKED, DATA_OD, DATA_DO, DATA_HASLA from jwt_user where id = #{id}
SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAZWISKO, IMIE, EMAIL, LOCKED, DATA_OD, DATA_DO, DATA_HASLA from jwt_user where username like #{param} or nazwisko like #{param}
select p.id, p.ID_USER, r.ID_ROLE, r.CODE_ROLE, r.DESCR, p.DATE_FROM, p.DATE_TO from jwt_roles r, jwt_user_role p where r.ID_ROLE = p.ID_ROLE (+) and p.ID_USER(+) = #{idusr}
mapper.update: UPDATE JWT_USER SET USERNAME = #{username}, PASSWORD = #{password}, NAZWISKO = #{nazwisko}, IMIE = #{imie}, LOCKED = #{locked}, EMAIL = #{email, jdbcType=CHAR, javaType=java.lang.String}, DATA_OD = #{data_od, jdbcType=DATE, javaType=java.sql.Timestamp}, DATA_DO = #{data_do, jdbcType=DATE, javaType=java.sql.Timestamp}, DATA_HASLA = #{data_hasla, jdbcType=DATE, javaType=java.sql.Timestamp} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JWT_USER ( USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAZWISKO, IMIE, EMAIL, LOCKED, DATA_OD, DATA_DO, DATA_HASLA) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nazwisko}, #{imie}, #{email}, #{locked}, #{data_od, jdbcType=DATE, javaType=java.sql.Timestamp}, #{data_do, jdbcType=DATE, javaType=java.sql.Timestamp}, #{data_hasla, jdbcType=DATE, javaType=java.sql.Timestamp} )
